#comment: institution comes from institution_id match to the registered content in source_id controlled vocabulary - A user must register their institution and source_id
The following attributes must be defined by the user
license: Data in this file produced by PCMDI is to be used for analysis with the PMP and for research purposes only.
#comment: source, source_id, source_label, source_type, source_version_number and region comes from source_id match in controlled vocabulary registered content
This is an optional field which can be changed by a user - CMOR will create the <outpath> defined below if it does not exist
In most cases 'BE' is the appropriate entry for variant_label. The user should consult ODS-v2.1.0 (https://goo.gl/jVZsQl) before changing
The user may choose to define or omit/delete some or all of the following
title: GPCP daily data prepared for PMPObs (ODS-v2.1.0)
#comment: The following are CMOR internal settings and should not be edited by the user
